verses.1: Ka lungsim khempeuh tawh Topa tungah lungdamna kong ko dinga, na bawl a lamdangte khempeuh ka gen ding hi.
verses.2: Nangma hangin nuamin ka diang dinga, na minphatna ka sa ding hi, Sangpen pa aw.
verses.3: Ka galte a nungkik ciangin, nangma mai ah amaute pukin kisia uh hi.
verses.4: Bang hang hiam cih leh keima thutanna na hong kipsak a, tokhom tungah tu-in thu a manin na khen hi.
verses.5: Minamte na taii a, migilote na susia hi. A maimang dingin amauʼ min na phiat hi.
verses.6: Siat denna sungah galte bei mang hi. A khuate uh na zunglot a, amaute kiphawk kha nawn lo hi.
verses.7: Topa ahihleh kumpi za ah tu ngitnget a, thukhen nadingin a tokhom a bawl hi.
verses.8: Leitung miteʼ thu a mantakin khen a, a kilawm bangin miteʼ thu a khen hi.
verses.9: Topa pen, netniamna a thuakte adingin munkip hi a, haksat hun ciangin mun muanhuai ahi hi.
verses.10: Topa aw, nang a hong zongte nusia lo na hih manin, na min a theite in nang hong muang uh hi.
verses.11: Zion ah a om Topa phatna la sa un! Ama nasepnate miteʼ lakah gen un!
verses.12: Bang hang hiam cih leh mi thahna a hua pa in amaute phawk a, a thuak miteʼ awging amah in mangngilh lo hi.
verses.13: Ka tungah hong dik in, Topa! Sihna pan hong hon khia pa aw, kei hong mudahteʼ hangin keima gim thuaknate hong en inla,
verses.14: nangmah a hong kiphatnate phawk kikkik inla, na hong hotkhiatna hangin Jerusalem khua sungah ka nuamna ka gengen ding hi.
verses.15: Amauʼ bawl sa gum sung mahah minamte kia suk uh a, a ngenthang siahna uh ah amauʼ khe mah a awk hi.
verses.16: Topa in thu hong khenin migilote amauʼ nasepna mahah awksakna tawh amah hong kilang hi.
verses.17: Pasian a mangngilh minam khempeuh sung panin migilote, Leinuai ah pai ding uh hi.
verses.18: Bang hang hiam cih leh mi cimawhte kimangngilh den lo dinga, mizawngteʼ lametna bei paisuak lo ding hi.
verses.19: Tho in, Topa! Mi kizosak keʼn; na mai ah minamte sam inla, amauteʼ tungah thu khen in!
verses.20: Amaute lausak in, Topa! Mi ahih lelna uh minamte theisak in!
